name: apas2aseg
author: FreeSurfer Developers
description: Converts aparc+aseg.mgz into aseg.mgz-like format by replacing specific cortical segmentations.

inputs.description: Subject identifier specifying the directory where the subject's data is stored.
inputs.name: Subject ID

inputs.description: Input aparc+aseg.mgz file to be converted.
inputs.name: Input aparc+aseg file

inputs.description: Output file for the new segmentation (e.g., apas-aseg.mgz).
inputs.name: Output segmentation file

output-files.description: The output segmentation file resulting from the conversion process.
output-files.name: Output segmentation file
